thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: A thrilling Haydn Mass dominates Symphony concert
thread.title_full: A thrilling Haydn Mass dominates Symphony concert - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joshua Kosman
title: A thrilling Haydn Mass dominates Symphony concert
text:
Photo: Stefan Cohen András Schiff was more effective conducting from the podium than from the piano bench. András Schiff was more effective conducting from the podium than...
Wednesday, Oct. 7’s concert by András Schiff and the San Francisco Symphony came as yet another reminder of the underappreciated glories of Haydn’s Mass settings. Why don’t we hear these pieces cycling steadily through the concert rotation, year after magnificent year? It’s a scandal. András Schiff was more effective conducting from the podium than from the piano bench. András Schiff was more effective conducting from the podium than...
